content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (17.5, 20.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (17.5, 20.5) with status NOT_CONNECTED due to no input liquid and no fluid present in connections.
- Boiler at position (1.5, 23.0) with status NO_FUEL, connected to a series of pipes and containing water at 15 degrees.
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5) with status WORKING, connected to a pipe network supplying water.
- PipeGroup (fluid system 85340) connecting various positions from (3.5, 17.5) to (10.5, 21.5).
- PipeGroup (fluid system 85351) carrying water, connecting positions from (-9.5, 23.5) to (-0.5, 23.5).
- ElectricityGroup (id 215647) with poles at various positions, currently with voltage 0.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors Related to Steam Engine Connection
- Ensure that all necessary fluid connections are established for the steam engine to function properly. Check for missing pipes or incorrect connections.

### Errors Due to Boiler Out of Fuel
- Regularly check the fuel status of the boiler and ensure it is refueled to maintain continuous operation.

### Errors When Using Pipes
- Verify that all pipes are correctly connected and not missing any segments to ensure proper fluid flow.

### Errors in Electricity Group Voltage
- Ensure that all electric poles are properly connected to a power source to maintain a stable voltage supply.
